discourse_list.title: Intangible Asset Agreed Modification of Management - 2023-01-19

content.content: Intangible Asset Agreed Modification of Management - 2023-01-19  Action Date - 2023-01-26 (post date + 1 week)  Asset(s)  email: [email protected]   Asset Type: Email Asset Owner: DAI Foundation (or should that be SF CU?) Platform Manager: Techops core-unit (discord channel ) Content Manager: Strategic Finance CU Purpose: Email address to report notifications regarding OFH collateral . This email address is in the legal contract that was published here. It will be a redirection to email of the delegate committee members (defined  here) and core unit people working on RWA monitoring (initially @roo and @SebVentures). Last Modification: -   Supporters @Patrick_J @Aes @0xdeniz @tadeo  Reason for Modification To comply with legal doc approved by MakerDAO and ensure RWA monitoring.
Feel free to add me as supportive  @SebVentures
Email created and all necessary configuration done by TechOps CU. Request may be considered resolved.

discourse_list.title: Intangible Asset Agreed Modification of Management - Latam.makerdao.com Subdomain

content.content: Intangible Asset Agreed Modification of Management - 2023-03-02  Action Date - 2023-03-09  Asset(s)  The Ambassador Program is requesting to use the assets of name and branding of MakerDAO for the development of a MakerDAO official LATAM website. The Ambassador Program is also requesting an official MakerDAO email to use for communication.   Asset name Subdomain Name: latam.makerdao.com  Asset Type: SubDomain Asset Owner: DAI Foundation Platform Manager: Ambassador Program ([email protected]) Content Manager: Ambassador Program ([email protected]) Purpose: To host Ambassador’s new website and introductory portal to MakerDAO. Last Modification: N/A (new subdomain)  Email Name: [email protected]  Asset Type: Email Asset Owner: DAI Foundation Platform Manager: Ambassador Program ([email protected]) Content Manager: Ambassador Program ([email protected]) Purpose: To get an official email for contact purposes. Last Modification: N/A (new email)   Supporters  @Tadeo @0xdeniz @Derek   Reason for Modification The program members noticed a lack of introductory material about MakerDAO and a need for it from the spanish-speaking community. It was also noticeable that all information was spread across a large number of forum posts and portals outside the Maker Forums, making it difficult to access. After a lot of hard work, an official MakerDAO LATAM website has been made by the Ambassador Program following Growth’s Brand Guidelines facilitated by @Nadia and @Tobal from the Growth Core Unit. The purpose of this website is to gather all original and translated educative content for the hispanic interested parties and community members, thus making it easier to navigate across the material and find information to start learning and participating. The Ambassador Program has created a new Spanish Introductory Portal, which is all 100% original content made by and for LATAM users. It addresses the following points:  Introduction to the DAO  What is a DAO Maker History and Maker Foundation DAOs Core Principles   Maker Governance  What is Governance On & Off-Chain Governance Voting & Proposals Cycles How to Participate   DAI  What is DAI DAI uses How to get DAI   Oracles  Case Uses & Basic Concepts   Vaults  Use Cases & Basic Concepts Stability Fees Risks & Liquidations     Website Preview  722×412 83.5 KB  The website is currently in the works and will debut in March, 2023. Once online, the website will be constantly updated as new Spaces, Newsletters and Introductory Portal’s articles will continue to be worked on by the Ambassador Program.  A mockup version of the official website can be found  here. Also, a pre-alpha browsable version of the website made on Wix can be seen  here.
content.GPT-summary: The post explains the proposal for the creation of an official MakerDAO LATAM website by the Ambassador Program. The proposal requests the use of MakerDAO's name and branding for the website and an official MakerDAO email for communication. The purpose of the website is to gather all original and translated educative content for the Spanish-speaking community, making it easier to navigate and find information to start learning and participating. The post includes a preview of the website and links to a mockup and pre-alpha version. Positive feedback is given by supporters, and the post extends an invitation to view the website.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: Hi @Sebix - please add an asset section specifying whether you request a specific email-account or whether you want to host your own email-server for the latam.makerdao.com subdomain ( you can see an example with two asset sections in one request here )
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal

content.content: Hi, Soren! I just added it. Please, let me know if further changes or clarifying needs to be done to our procedure. Thank you.
